title: Super low fat slow cooker ragu
ingredients: ['100g onions, finely chopped', '100g carrots, finely chopped', '100g celery, finely chopped', '4 cloves garlic, chopped', '500g extra lean steak mince (Tesco)', '1 teaspoon oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste', '200ml red wine', '2 tins chopped plum tomatoes', '1 teaspoon brown sugar', '1/2 tube tomato puree', '1 bay leaf']
